name: Forever Labyrinth
description:
Forever Labyrinth

Forever Labyrinth is a small rogue-like where you play as a prisoner of was sent down to the dungeons and must slay every single demon you find in order to gain your freedom. 

This top-down shooter and rage game is fast paced and intense, each playthrough is a little different. Survive for as long as you can, good luck!

Controls

 - WASD to move

 - Space to dash

 - Left Click to shoot

 - Right Click for a power shot

Shop

 - Speed Boost increases by 0.25

 - Damage Boost increases by 1

 - Power Damage Boost increases by 3

 - Coin Value Boost increases by 0.5

Feedback

Please give feedback! This is the first game I've uploaded to Itch so I'd love some advice on how to improve your experience. Also please tell me if you've encountered any bugs, thanks!
